00013 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00014 {
00015     char host_name[256], exp_name[32];
00016 
00017     cm_get_environment(host_name, sizeof(host_name), exp_name,
00018                        sizeof(exp_name));
00019     cm_connect_experiment(host_name, exp_name, "Compression", NULL);
00020     cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00021 
00022     /* Not really necessary */
00023     // Determine which compression to use
00024     char key_name[80];
00025     int runnumber=-1;
00026     int size=sizeof(int);
00027     sprintf(key_name, "Runinfo/Run number");
00028     db_get_value(hDB,0,key_name, &runnumber, &size, TID_INT,1);
00029     bool USE_OLD_COMPRESSION=false;
00030     if (runnumber > 30000 && runnumber < 50000)
00031       {
00032         USE_OLD_COMPRESSION=true;
00033       }
00034     printf("Determined that we should use old compression %d\n", USE_OLD_COMPRESSION);
00035     // Done determining which decompression to use
00036     
00037     compress_load_all(USE_OLD_COMPRESSION);
00038     /* Done with unnecessary code */
00039     compress_load_all();
00040     if(argc != 3) {
00041       printf("Usage: mucap_expand uncompressed_input.mid uncompressed_output.mid\n");
00042       exit(1);
00043     }
00044 
00045     FILE *fp = fopen(argv[1], "r");
00046     if (!fp) {
00047       printf("Unable to open %s\n", argv[1]);
00048       exit(1);
00049     }
00050 
00051     FILE *output_fp = fopen(argv[2], "w");
00052     if (!fp) {
00053       printf("Unable to open %s\n", argv[2]);
00054       exit(1);
00055     }
00056 
00057     char *input_event = new char[MAX_EVENT_SIZE];
00058     char *output_event = new char[MAX_EVENT_SIZE];
00059 
00060     while (read_midas_event(fp, input_event) == SUCCESS) {
00061         EVENT_HEADER header = *((EVENT_HEADER *) input_event);
00062 
00063         int event_id = header.event_id;
00064 
00065         if (event_id == EVENTID_BOR || event_id == EVENTID_EOR ||
00066             event_id == EVENTID_MESSAGE) {
00067 
00068            // For non-ordinary events, just write out the raw data
00069            fwrite(input_event, 1, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER) + header.data_size,
00070                   output_fp);
00071         } else {
00072     
00073           bk_init32(output_event);
00074           expand_event(input_event + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER), output_event,USE_OLD_COMPRESSION);
00075           header.data_size = bk_size(output_event);
00076 
00077           fwrite(&header, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER), 1, output_fp);
00078           fwrite(output_event, 1, header.data_size, output_fp);
00079        }
00080     }
00081 
00082     fclose(fp);
00083     fclose(output_fp);
00084 
00085     cm_disconnect_experiment();
00086 }
